text: Quản trị viên hoặc cán sự lớp có trách nhiệm nhập thông tin về ngày nghỉ học của học sinh vào hệ thống.

The subsequent figures depict several screens from the application. Figure 4.6 illustrates the login screen interface, which users encounter upon their initial visit to the app. To log in, users must provide their email address and password. If an account does not exist, users can proceed to the next screen to register. Figure 4.7 displays the signup screen interface, where users can create an account by entering basic information. Upon successful validation of the provided details, a new account is generated, and the user is directed to the subsequent screen. Figure 4.8 presents the home screen interface, the primary screen for logged-in users. Here, posts from the user and those they follow are displayed, allowing interactions such as liking, commenting, saving, and sharing. On the right side, a section lists users not currently followed by the logged-in user, with the option to refresh the list using a loop icon. The header, consistent across all post-login pages, enables users to search for other users and navigate between different screens.

Experimental studies indicate that the performance of distributed training using stochastic gradient descent (SGD) is heavily influenced by batch size and, in asynchronous setups, by gradient staleness. Notably, speedup gains plateau when batch sizes exceed a threshold or delays become excessive. We introduce a data-dependent parameter that accounts for this saturation effect in both scenarios. Our extensive theoretical framework, covering strongly convex, convex, and non-convex cases, integrates and extends previous research that typically examined only one of these factors. This method also enables us to achieve better speedup outcomes under common sparsity conditions. The analysis provides theoretically grounded recommendations for adjusting learning rates in practical applications. Our findings are shown to be optimal and are validated through numerical experiments.

This research investigates value function approximation in reinforcement learning (RL) for high-dimensional state or action spaces using an extended form of representation policy iteration (RPI). We analyze the shortcomings of proto-value functions (PVFs) in achieving precise low-dimensional value function approximations and emphasize the role of feature learning for enhanced performance. To address this, we employ various graph-based representation learning techniques to identify optimal basis functions for value function representation. Experimental results demonstrate that node2vec, a scalable network feature learning method, and the Variational Graph Auto-Encoder consistently surpass traditional smooth proto-value functions in low-dimensional feature spaces.

We present a novel uncertainty metric for classification tasks, termed logit uncertainty, which is derived from neural network logit outputs and demonstrates robustness across various applications. Our analysis reveals that this measure surpasses existing uncertainty quantification methods in performance, particularly for out-of-distribution detection and error identification. We investigate the theoretical underpinnings of this metric and examine its connection to high-density regions. Additionally, we illustrate its application in assessing uncertainty through intermediate outputs during generative adversarial network training. The paper further suggests two practical implementations of logit-based uncertainty and validates its superior effectiveness in real-world scenarios.

Mất đoạn AZF (yếu tố gây vô tinh) là nguyên nhân di truyền phổ biến nhất dẫn đến vô sinh nam. Việc sàng lọc AZF được đề xuất khi số lượng tinh trùng suy giảm. Nghiên cứu này đánh giá tần suất và đặc điểm mất đoạn AZF ở nam vô sinh tại Bệnh viện Hùng Vương. Phương pháp: Hồi cứu hồ sơ 526 bệnh nhân nam vô sinh từ 5/2018 đến 5/2021, bao gồm kết quả mất đoạn AZF, khám lâm sàng, tinh dịch đồ, nội tiết tố nam và nhiễm sắc thể (NST) đồ. Bệnh nhân chia thành 4 nhóm: vô tinh, thiểu tinh rất nặng, nặng và vừa/nhẹ. Kết quả: Tỷ lệ mất đoạn AZF là 25,9% (136 ca), chủ yếu là AZFc (92,6%) và AZFbc (7,4%). AZFc bán phần (85,7%) gồm gr/gr (89,8%) và b2/b3 (10,2%), trong khi AZFc toàn phần (b2/b4) chiếm 14,3%. Tỷ lệ mất đoạn tăng theo mức độ thiểu tinh: cao nhất ở vô tinh không tắc (33,5%) và thiểu tinh rất nặng (32,9%), thấp hơn ở thiểu tinh nặng (23,9%) (χ2 test, p<0.0001). 11,1% thiểu tinh vừa/nhẹ cũng có mất đoạn AZF. Trong 396 ca làm NST đồ, 9,6% (38 ca) bất thường NST, gồm hội chứng Klinefelter (24), thể khảm 45X/46XY [1], đảo/chuyển đoạn [9] và bất thường cấu trúc khác [4]. Tỷ lệ mất đoạn AZF ở nhóm NST bình thường và bất thường tương đương (25,9% vs 26,3%). Cụ thể, tỷ lệ này ở vô tinh 46XY không tắc, Klinefelter, đảo/chuyển đoạn NST và bất sản tinh hoàn bẩm sinh lần lượt là 34,4%, 25%, 22,2% và 11,4%. Một ca thể khảm 45X/46XY cũng có mất đoạn AZF. Kết luận: Mất đoạn AZF thường gặp ở nam vô sinh do thiểu tinh nặng (<5 x 10⁶/mL) và có thể đi kèm bất thường NST. Do 10% thiểu tinh vừa/nhẹ cũng có mất đoạn, cần cân nhắc chỉ định sàng lọc AZF theo khuyến cáo, điều kiện thực tế tại Việt Nam và các yếu tố khác của cặp vợ chồng vô sinh.

This study introduces a deep neural network designed for model-free forecasting of chaotic dynamical systems using noisy data. The deep learning approach focuses on estimating the conditional probability distribution of state variables, utilizing a Long Short-Term Memory (LSTM) network to capture nonlinear dynamics and a softmax layer to represent probability distributions. Training involves minimizing a regularized cross-entropy loss function. Evaluations on delay-time chaotic systems, including the Mackey-Glass and Ikeda equations, demonstrate the LSTM's effectiveness in predicting nonlinear dynamics while efficiently suppressing noise. The results reveal that the prediction uncertainty in multi-step forecasts does not follow a monotonic trend over time; instead, the standard deviation of predictions exhibits dynamic fluctuations, increasing or decreasing unpredictably.

Vietnamese text frequently contains compound words, diacritics, and unique characters, necessitating specialized tokenization approaches. Adapting the NER model is essential to ensure precise identification and extraction of named entities from Vietnamese text. Named Entity Recognition (NER) entails detecting and categorizing entities such as personal names, organizations, locations, and dates within the text. Given that Vietnamese features distinct named entities, an NER model specifically trained on Vietnamese datasets would be more effective in accurately recognizing and extracting these entities. Furthermore, the model must be designed to address the linguistic nuances and complexities inherent to the Vietnamese language.

Trong lần hợp tác đầu tiên, mô gớ sẽ liên hệ với chủ nhà để thu thập thông tin về chỗ nghỉ, bao gồm: vị trí, tiện ích, địa điểm xung quanh, chính sách, quy định đặc biệt, v.v. Tiếp theo, mô gớ sẽ yêu cầu thông tin về các hạng phòng, bảng giá và hình ảnh phòng tương ứng. Do mô gớ được áp dụng chính sách giá đặc biệt hơn so với khách lẻ, họ không thể đặt phòng qua các trang đặt phòng trực tuyến mà phải liên hệ trực tiếp với chủ nhà. Sau đó, chủ nhà sẽ ghi chú lại lịch đặt phòng một cách thủ công.

Ground-based sky-cameras equipped with fish-eye lenses capture sky/cloud images with an extensive field of view, yet the sky's luminance dynamic range exceeds the capabilities of standard cameras. Consequently, single-exposure images often fail to preserve details across the entire scene, with the circumsolar area appearing overexposed and the horizon regions underexposed, complicating cloud segmentation. This paper introduces HDRCloudSeg, a novel approach leveraging High-Dynamic-Range (HDR) imaging through multi-exposure fusion to enhance cloud segmentation. We detail the HDR image creation process and provide a publicly available dataset for evaluation. As the first method utilizing HDR radiance maps for cloud segmentation, our technique delivers highly accurate outcomes.

When order-isomorphism is permitted rather than requiring precise matches, U-cycles for \( S_n \) can be constructed. Specifically, a U-cycle \( U_n = (a_0, a_1, \dots, a_{n!-1}) \), where \( a_i \in \), corresponds uniquely to one block \( (a_{i+1}, \dots, a_{i+n}) \), with \( a_i = a_j \) if \( i \equiv j \ (\text{mod} \ n!) \). Two n-tuples \( \mathbf{a} = (a_1, a_2, \dots, a_n) \) and \( \mathbf{b} = (b_1, b_2, \dots, b_n) \) are considered order-isomorphic, denoted \( \mathbf{a} \sim \mathbf{b} \), if \( a_i < a_j \) implies \( b_i < b_j \) for all \( 0 < i, j \leqslant n \). An example of a U-cycle for \( S_3 \) is provided.

This study focuses on accelerating semantic segmentation for video applications, where real-time or faster processing is often required. While existing approaches reduce computational load by propagating features from keyframes, recent improvements in rapid image segmentation diminish their effectiveness. To enhance video segmentation using these advancements, we present a straightforward yet effective propagation method. Our approach involves estimating optical flow in downscaled images for efficient temporal warping in segmentation space. Additionally, we employ a guided spatially-varying convolution to combine segmentations from consecutive frames, reducing propagation errors and allowing lightweight feature extraction for non-keyframes. Evaluations on Cityscapes and CamVid demonstrate that our method achieves the best balance between accuracy and processing speed for video segmentation.

In the context of big data, diverse real-world applications produce extensive time-series datasets, many of which exhibit notable or latent periodic trends, such as those in weather and financial domains. Efficiently detecting these underlying periodic patterns and enabling precise forecasting from vast time-series data is essential. This paper introduces the Periodicity-based Parallel Time Series Prediction (PPTSP) algorithm, designed for large-scale time-series analysis and implemented within the Apache Spark cloud framework. To manage extensive historical datasets effectively, the Time Series Data Compression and Abstraction (TSDCA) algorithm is introduced, minimizing data volume while preserving key features. Building on this, the Multi-layer Time Series Periodic Pattern Recognition (MTSPPR) algorithm employs Fourier Spectrum Analysis (FSA) for pattern detection. Additionally, the Periodicity-based Time Series Prediction (PTSP) algorithm is proposed, forecasting future data by leveraging prior periodic models and incorporating a time decay factor to adjust the influence of historical periods. To enhance computational efficiency, a parallelized approach is implemented using Apache Spark’s Streaming module, utilizing Distributed Streams (DStreams) and Resilient Distributed Datasets (RDDs) for scalable data storage and processing. Comprehensive experiments demonstrate that the PPTSP algorithm outperforms existing methods in both prediction accuracy and computational performance.

COVID-19 là bệnh gây ra bởi chủng vi rút Corona mới (SARS-CoV-2). Về mặt di truyền và dịch tễ, SARS-CoV-2 khác biệt với SARS-CoV và MERS-CoV, thuộc nhóm β-coronavirus, xâm nhập tế bào chủ thông qua vùng liên kết thụ thể (RBD) trên protein S và thụ thể ACE2. Đại dịch toàn cầu này đã gây hậu quả nghiêm trọng. Bệnh biểu hiện đa dạng trên nhiều hệ cơ quan như hô hấp, tim mạch, tiêu hóa, thần kinh, nội tiết… và có thể tiến triển thành suy hô hấp cấp, thậm chí tử vong. Chụp X-quang ngực thẳng là phương pháp dễ tiếp cận, an toàn, hỗ trợ chẩn đoán sớm và đánh giá mức độ tổn thương phổi ở bệnh nhân COVID-19. Thang điểm Brixia được dùng để đánh giá bán định lượng mức độ nặng và phạm vi tổn thương phổi ở bệnh nhân COVID-19 nhập viện. So với các thang điểm khác, Brixia đơn giản, dễ sử dụng và có thể áp dụng lặp lại trong lâm sàng. Thang điểm này cũng có độ tin cậy cao giữa các bác sĩ và hỗ trợ tiên lượng nguy cơ tử vong ở bệnh nhân nhiễm SARS-CoV-2.

Trong vòng 5 năm qua, Nhật Bản – một quốc gia đang đối mặt với tình trạng già hóa dân số – đã tích cực triển khai các chính sách thu hút lao động nước ngoài nhằm hỗ trợ phát triển đa ngành, bao gồm CNTT, dệt may, xây dựng, điều dưỡng và nhiều lĩnh vực khác. Điều này đã thúc đẩy nhu cầu học và ôn thi tiếng Nhật tại Việt Nam tăng mạnh, với số lượng người học và cơ sở đào tạo tăng lên đáng kể. Cụ thể, sau 20 năm, số cơ sở đào tạo tiếng Nhật đã tăng hơn 26 lần, trong khi số lượng người học tăng hơn 17 lần. Sự gia tăng này đã thúc đẩy sự ra đời và phát triển nhanh chóng của các mô hình và hệ thống chia sẻ kiến thức, tài liệu học tiếng Nhật để đáp ứng nhu cầu thị trường. Đối với người mới học, việc đọc hiểu tài liệu gốc tiếng Nhật thường gặp nhiều khó khăn, dẫn đến nhu cầu tìm kiếm tài liệu dịch sang tiếng Việt để hỗ trợ học tập hiệu quả hơn. Tuy nhiên, việc thiếu nguồn tài liệu dịch chất lượng và sự phân tán của các tài liệu trên mạng xã hội như Facebook, Zalo hoặc các website khác khiến người học dễ bị lạc trong một lượng lớn thông tin không chính xác, đặc biệt là những người mới bắt đầu chưa quen với việc tìm kiếm tài liệu.

In the algorithm, \( n \) represents the total number of vertices in the graph, \( d[i][j] \) denotes the current shortest path estimate between vertices \( i \) and \( j \), and \( d[i][k] + d[k][j] \) signifies the combined path length from vertex \( i \) to \( k \) and from \( k \) to \( j \). The process concludes once all estimates reach a stable state, resulting in the final \( d \) matrix that contains the shortest path lengths for every pair of vertices.

Flask là một framework web được phát triển bằng ngôn ngữ Python, dựa trên bộ công cụ Werkzeug WSGI và công cụ tạo mẫu Jinja2. Là một micro web framework, Flask không yêu cầu các thư viện hoặc công cụ cụ thể, đồng thời không tích hợp sẵn các lớp trừu tượng hóa cơ sở dữ liệu, thư viện xây dựng sẵn từ bên thứ ba, hoặc các phương thức xác thực mẫu phổ biến. Flask hỗ trợ lập trình viên trong việc xây dựng các trang web dễ dàng, có khả năng mở rộng, hiệu quả và dễ bảo trì thông qua việc cung cấp mã nguồn hoặc tiện ích mở rộng tái sử dụng cho các tác vụ thông thường. UC Code UC03, titled "Rating," involves the participation of the customer as the primary actor. The use case describes the process of rating product quality. The trigger event occurs when the customer selects the number of stars to rate the product. A precondition for this action is that the customer must be logged into the system. The scenario unfolds as follows: (1) the actor selects the number of stars, (2) the system presents the registration interface, and (3) the system saves the rating information and confirms the successful rating. The result is the display of a success message and the storage of the rating data. No extensions or exceptions are noted for this use case. This description corresponds to the Feedback Usecase depicted in Figure 2.11.

Since their initial introduction by de Bruijn in 1946, de Bruijn graphs and their associated sequences have been extensively researched and expanded under various designations, such as positioning sequences, m-sequences, and shift register sequences. De Bruijn's objective was to develop a recursive method for counting the number of cyclic binary sequences of length 2^k, ensuring that every binary k-tuple appears exactly once as a window of length k within each sequence.

In the field of cryptography, the Baltimore Hilton Inn implemented a cipher lock system based on de Bruijn sequences as an alternative to traditional key-lock mechanisms for its rooms. This system utilized an inexpensive n-stage shift register to produce maximum-length pseudorandom sequences for stream ciphers. of strong baseline methods. The Transformer's attention mechanism faces scalability challenges for long sequences due to its quadratic computational and memory requirements. This paper introduces Luna, a linear unified nested attention approach that approximates softmax attention through two nested linear attention functions, achieving linear time and space complexity. Luna first compresses the input sequence into a fixed-length representation using the initial attention function, then reconstructs it with the second function. Unlike conventional attention mechanisms, Luna incorporates an additional fixed-length sequence as both input and output, enabling linear attention operations while preserving sufficient contextual details. Comprehensive experiments on long-context sequence modeling, neural machine translation, and large-scale pretraining with masked language modeling demonstrate Luna's competitive or superior performance against multiple strong baselines, confirming its effectiveness and efficiency.

Bài báo mô tả quy trình nghiên cứu sản xuất graphene khử tách nhiệt và biến tính bằng polyvinyl alcohol (PVA) để ứng dụng làm sơn nước dẫn điện dựa trên nền polyurethane (PU). Graphite oxide (GO) được điều chế từ graphit bằng phương pháp Hummer, sau đó graphene được tổng hợp thông qua quá trình khử tách nhiệt GO. Graphene sau đó được biến tính bằng cách phân tán vào dung dịch PVA với các nồng độ và tỷ lệ khối lượng khác nhau nhằm tối ưu hóa quá trình biến tính. Graphene biến tính với PVA có khả năng phân tán dễ dàng trong nước. Polyme tạo màng sơn PU gốc nước được tổng hợp bằng phản ứng polyme hóa giữa isophorone diisocyanate (IPDI) với poly(tetramethylene glycol) (PTMG) và dimethylol propionic acid. Các nhóm carboxylate trên bề mặt hạt polyme giúp chúng phân tán tốt và ổn định trong nước, do đó quá trình polyme hóa không cần sử dụng chất hoạt động bề mặt. Các phương pháp phân tích bao gồm kính hiển vi điện tử quét phát xạ trường (FESEM) kết hợp phân tích EDX, đo diện tích bề mặt BET, phổ Micro-Raman và đo điện trở. Sơn nước dẫn điện từ graphene có độ bám dính tốt, độ dẫn điện của màng sơn khô đạt 0,1-4 mS/cm với hàm lượng graphene khoảng 5-10 wt%.

Module giả mã đề xuất dựa trên mô đun MLP được giới thiệu trong bài báo SegFormer. Kiến trúc của mô đun này được minh họa trong Hình 3.8. Bài báo đã chứng minh rằng đây là một kiến trúc mạng nhẹ, được thiết kế đơn giản để tận dụng ưu điểm của các đặc trưng được tạo ra bởi kiến trúc MT, bao gồm trường tiếp nhận cục bộ lớn nhờ cấu trúc phân tầng và khả năng tạo ra đặc trưng toàn cục. Cụ thể, các đặc trưng từ MT cho thấy cơ chế chú ý ở các tầng thấp có xu hướng duy trì tính cục bộ, trong khi ở các tầng cao hơn, tính toàn cục được ưu tiên. Đối với bài toán phân vùng ngữ nghĩa, việc duy trì trường tiếp nhận lớn để trích xuất thông tin ngữ cảnh hiệu quả là yếu tố quan trọng. Mô đun này tích hợp thông tin từ nhiều tầng khác nhau, kết hợp cả thông tin chú ý cục bộ (local attention) và thông tin chú ý toàn cục (global attention), nhằm tạo ra các biểu diễn đặc trưng mạnh mẽ.

Kịch bản kiểm thử bao gồm các bước: (1) Chọn chức năng "donate" trên menu hệ thống, (2) Chọn tab quỹ chung, (3) Nhập thông tin của nhà hảo tâm, (4) Nhấn "Tiếp", (5) Nhập thông tin chuyển khoản, (6) Tạo mã QR, và (7) Hoàn tất quy trình. Controller (Bộ điều khiển): Đây là thành phần chịu trách nhiệm điều khiển, xử lý các sự kiện và tương tác giữa Model và View. Controller nhận các yêu cầu từ người dùng thông qua giao diện người dùng (View), sau đó tương tác với Model để truy xuất hoặc cập nhật dữ liệu. Dữ liệu sau khi được xử lý sẽ được chuyển đến View để hiển thị. Vai trò chính của Controller là trung gian giữa Model và View, và nó không lưu trữ dữ liệu cụ thể của ứng dụng.

In Redux, the application's entire global state is maintained within a single store as an object tree. Modifying the state tree requires the creation of an action—an object that describes an event—which is then dispatched to the store. To define how the state is updated in response to an action, pure reducer functions must be implemented to compute a new state based on the previous state and the action. Unlike the traditional MVC model, which separates data, interface, and logic processing into three distinct components, Redux operates differently. The MVC model employs a bidirectional data flow, where changes in one component's data can influence the application's state across other components.

The Warehouse Management module within the DxClan system is designed based on the Client-server model, where the Server manages database connections, processes logic, and provides APIs for clients or third parties to access and utilize data. Upon receiving a request from a client or third party, the Server authenticates the user’s information, verifies access rights, processes the request, updates the database if required, and returns the relevant data. The client is responsible for rendering the web interface, enabling users to interact seamlessly and send requests to the Server. The Server is structured using the MVC architecture, comprising Model, View, and Controller components, while the client is developed using Redux’s architecture, organized into modular components corresponding to specific functionalities.

In the realm of 2D convolutional networks for point clouds, point-based methods directly process fixed-size point sets. Through an examination of PointNet, a foundational work in applying deep learning to point sets, we demonstrate that existing point-based techniques primarily function as spatial relationship processors. This paper proposes an alternative framework called PE-Net, which learns high-dimensional representations of point clouds and transforms unordered input points into feature vectors compatible with standard 2D CNNs. Unlike current approaches, our network accommodates varying input point counts. Experimental results on classification and part segmentation tasks demonstrate that PE-Net achieves state-of-the-art performance across challenging datasets, including ModelNet and ShapeNetPart.

The augmented image is removed from the augmentedImageMap using the specified image name, which is predefined by the developer within the AR project. The User Experience is a key consideration; by incorporating AR and 3D elements, my app offers a more engaging and user-friendly interface compared to traditional 2D applications. Furthermore, in contrast to other AR apps, mine demonstrates notably lower latency and reduced power consumption, achieved through the minimal use of 3D platforms and reliance on pre-processed data. Extensive testing was conducted during development, particularly at AEON Mall, to ensure accurate mapping of physical spaces. Despite its potential, the app is not without limitations, as errors can occur, especially in large environments like AEON Mall, where minor movements or rotations may result in incorrect path guidance. Currently, the app is exclusive to Android due to limited access to developer devices and insufficient time to explore AR platforms on other operating systems. Kết hợp với khoảng cách tạo xe, sau 48 tập huấn luyện, tất cả các trạng thái lưu lượng có thể xuất hiện trên từng làn đường trong môi trường đã được mô phỏng. Sau khi đảm bảo tính bao quát, bước tiếp theo là tạo xe. Các mô hình xe được thiết kế hoàn chỉnh, và sau một khoảng thời gian giãn cách đã định nghĩa, xe được tạo ra và gắn với một lộ trình cụ thể. Quá trình lựa chọn lộ trình được thực hiện một cách ngẫu nhiên có kiểm soát, dựa trên các thông số về thứ tự ưu tiên và mật độ của các mức ưu tiên. Optimizing computational efficiency is crucial when implementing machine learning models for real-time time series forecasting. While such algorithms automatically update model parameters using input data, they still rely on user-defined hyperparameters, which play a key role in determining prediction performance. Traffic data, commonly gathered through online sensors, exhibits serial correlation and may undergo gradual distribution shifts over time. A common approach to address this involves periodic hyperparameter re-tuning, though this introduces computational overhead. This study introduces a computationally efficient and theoretically grounded online hyperparameter optimization method for Kernel Ridge regression, specifically tailored for traffic prediction. Experimental results using actual traffic data demonstrate that the proposed method reduces computation time by up to sevenfold compared to alternative tuning approaches while maintaining or improving prediction accuracy.

Vấn đề: Loãng xương dẫn đến gãy xương là bệnh lý chuyển hóa xương thường gặp. Các dấu ấn sinh học liên quan đến mật độ xương (MĐX) có giá trị trong phòng ngừa và chẩn đoán sớm bệnh. Mục tiêu: Xác định các chất chuyển hóa đặc trưng của MĐX. Đối tượng: 100 phụ nữ trên 50 tuổi, gồm 50 người loãng xương và 50 người khỏe mạnh. Phương pháp: Nghiên cứu bệnh-chứng, sử dụng kỹ thuật LC-MS/MS không định hướng để phân tích metabolites. Chẩn đoán loãng xương dựa trên đo MĐX tại cổ xương đùi (FNBMD) và cột sống thắt lưng (LSBMD) bằng máy DXA Hologic Horizon. Kết quả: Trong 166 metabolites được định danh, 12 chất có khác biệt rõ rệt (p < 0,0001) giữa hai nhóm, bao gồm 2 chất liên quan đến MĐX thấp (LSBMD) là L-Carnitine và Glycerophosphocholine, cùng 1 chất giúp tăng MĐX (FNBMD). Mối tương quan này vẫn có ý nghĩa sau khi hiệu chỉnh theo tuổi, BMI và vận động. Kết luận: Nghiên cứu bước đầu tìm ra một số chất chuyển hóa đặc trưng cho MĐX, có tiềm năng hỗ trợ chẩn đoán sớm và phòng ngừa loãng xương.

Such acts often result in physical harm and are typically accompanied by significant psychological trauma.

Material identification in real-world environments presents difficulties because of the intricate interactions between shape, surface reflectance, and lighting conditions. Traditional methods for material classification predominantly depend on manually designed visual features. This study employs a Convolutional Neural Network (convnet) to automatically learn discriminative features tailored for material recognition. By leveraging transfer learning from object recognition tasks, the model achieves more efficient training of effective features for material classification. This convnet-based transfer learning method demonstrates substantially improved accuracy over existing leading techniques. Additionally, the study examines the separate roles of reflectance and shading through an intrinsic image decomposition. Despite the advantages of transfer learning, convnet-based material classification faces challenges due to the substantial need for extensive and varied training data. To address this, we introduce a novel dataset comprising around 10,000 images categorized into 10 material types.

Frozen Ether refers to a situation where Ether becomes permanently trapped or unreachable within a smart contract, often resulting from coding flaws or insufficient validation mechanisms. This vulnerability arises when users transfer funds into a contract but are unable to retrieve or utilize those assets, effectively rendering the assets "frozen" within the contract.

Recent studies indicate that convolutional neural networks tend to prioritize texture information over shape features in classification tasks. We introduce a novel distinction between shape and local image cues versus global image statistics. Our proposed technique, Permuted Adaptive Instance Normalization (pAdaIN), diminishes the influence of global statistics in classifier hidden layers. pAdaIN employs a random permutation \(\pi\) to rearrange batch samples, followed by Adaptive Instance Normalization (AdaIN) between each sample \(i\) and its permuted counterpart \(\pi(i)\), thereby exchanging statistical properties. This process disrupts global statistics, forcing the network to focus on alternative cues like shape or texture. By adjusting the probability \(p\) of applying the permutation—selected beforehand without test data influence—we regulate the method's intensity. With an optimal fixed \(p\), our approach consistently surpasses baselines across diverse scenarios. It enhances performance on CIFAR100 and ImageNet for various architectures in classification tasks, improves robustness on ImageNet-C and CIFAR-100-C, and achieves state-of-the-art results in domain adaptation and generalization, particularly in GTAV-to-Cityscapes transfer learning and the PACS benchmark.

Visual place recognition in dynamic environments involves identifying correspondences between query and reference observation sets despite significant visual variations. While CNN-based image descriptors have shown considerable success in recent studies, current evaluations often presume uniform environmental conditions within each set (e.g., reference: daylight, query: nighttime). Our research reveals that when conditions vary within a single set (e.g., reference: day, query: daytime-dusk-night-dawn sequence), locations under identical conditions may appear more alike than the same location under differing conditions, causing state-of-the-art CNN-based methods to underperform. This study examines the critical challenge of in-sequence environmental variations, categorizing them into three progressive scenarios: (1) no intra-sequence changes, (2) discrete intra-sequence variations, and (3) continuous intra-sequence fluctuations. We assess the impact of these variations on two leading CNN descriptors, highlighting both the value and constraints of descriptor standardization, particularly with continuous changes. To tackle this practical challenge, we explore unsupervised learning techniques, evaluating two existing PCA-based methods and introducing an enhanced clustering-based normalization approach for statistical adjustment.

We introduce Matrix Nets (xNets), a novel deep learning framework designed for object detection. xNets organize objects of varying sizes and aspect ratios into distinct layers, ensuring uniformity in these dimensions within each layer. This design results in a structure that inherently accounts for scale and aspect ratio variations. By applying xNets to key-point-based detection, our model attains a 47.8 mAP on MS COCO, surpassing all single-shot detectors in performance. Additionally, it utilizes 50% fewer parameters and trains three times faster than the closest competing architecture.

The SDK sends a query to the metadata repository to reconstruct the private key when necessary. Upon receiving the query, the backend fetches the encrypted shares linked to the specified user and application from the database. These encrypted shares are cached in a Redis database to enhance performance and expedite future requests. The SDK then begins the reconstruction process by decrypting each share using its corresponding decryption key, which is securely managed and accessible only to authorized processes. By decrypting the shares, the SDK retrieves the original confidential information and combines the decrypted shares using interpolation algorithms, such as Lagrange interpolation, to reconstruct the private key. This mathematical process interpolates missing portions of the key, ensuring its complete recovery. Throughout this process, robust encryption and secure key management protocols safeguard the private key's privacy and integrity. Shamir’s secret sharing scheme enhances security by distributing the key across multiple shares, mitigating risks of single points of failure or compromise. This secure reconstruction process ensures the private key's safe and reliable retrieval, enabling users to securely access their Web3 accounts and perform authorized operations confidently. Comprehensive security measures protect the private key from unauthorized access, providing users with peace of mind when interacting with decentralized applications (DApps) and the broader Web3 ecosystem. The system’s meticulous design underscores its commitment to delivering a secure and user-friendly Web3 authentication solution.  

The asynchronous creation of the encKey process is a critical and innovative aspect of the system’s architecture, designed to optimize efficiency and resource utilization. By pre-generating a pool of unused encKeys, the system eliminates the need to run the Distributed Key Generation (DKG) protocol repeatedly, enabling swift and seamless key assignment. This approach reduces computational overhead and enhances the user experience. Executors, responsible for initiating the encKey generation process, monitor the current round’s status and the number of inactive keys. When the system identifies a need for new keys—such as during a null state or the "waitfordealer" phase—and the idle key count falls below the threshold, the executors initiate the next round. This proactive strategy ensures the system is always prepared to meet user demands, minimizing delays. During the "sharing dealer" phase, executors combine and distribute their confidential shares to the designated sharing dealer, contributing to the process without exposing sensitive information. This collaborative approach maintains the security and integrity of the keys. Following the "sharing dealer" phase, the protocol transitions to the "waitforrows" phase, where executors generate public key shares using the shared secrets from the previous phase. These public key exchanges validate the authenticity of user-assigned keys. Once the "waitforrows" phase concludes, the system is ready to assign encKeys to users. When a user requests a key, the system assigns the appropriate round and provides the key promptly, ensuring efficient and seamless key assignment.

Time series classification (TSC) encompasses various algorithmic approaches that leverage distinct discriminatory patterns. Among these, classifiers relying on phase-dependent intervals form a notable category. The time series forest (TSF) method is a prominent interval-based classifier, recognized for its efficiency in training and prediction, along with strong performance. However, newer techniques have surpassed TSF in effectiveness. Originally, TSF employs three basic summary statistics for interval analysis. Recently, the `catch22' feature set, comprising 22 diverse and informative time series descriptors, was introduced to enhance time series analysis. We introduce the Canonical Interval Forest (CIF), a novel classifier that integrates TSF with catch22, along with refined training techniques and multivariate classification support. Our results show substantial accuracy gains over both TSF and catch22, positioning CIF competitively with leading methods from other algorithmic families. Furthermore, replacing TSF with CIF in the hierarchical vote collective of transformation-based ensembles (HIVE-COTE) yields notable improvements. HIVE-COTE with CIF achieves unmatched accuracy on the UCR archive, establishing a new benchmark in TSC performance.

Safeguarding individual privacy by securing sensitive attributes is a critical concern when releasing microdata, yet maintaining data quality or utility for specific workloads remains equally vital. We introduce a new privacy-preserving framework grounded in the k-anonymity model, specifically designed for applications requiring the retention of quasi-identifier variable probability distributions. This approach integrates distribution-preserving quantization with k-member clustering, developing two specialized variants that employ intra-cluster and Gaussian dithering of cluster centers to maintain distribution integrity. We theoretically analyze these schemes regarding distribution preservation and highlight their applicability in scenarios like covariate shift and transfer learning, where such preservation is essential. Through comprehensive testing on real-world Medical Expenditure Panel Survey data, we illustrate the advantages of our algorithms compared to conventional k-anonymization for a key healthcare use case involving an insurer assessing market entry risks. Additionally, empirical evaluation of reidentification risk confirms that our methods effectively uphold k-anonymity.

This study examines how the structure of a discrete graphical model relates to the support of the inverse of a generalized covariance matrix. We demonstrate that, for specific graph configurations, the inverse covariance matrix's support for vertex indicator variables captures the graph's conditional independence relationships. Our findings generalize prior results limited to multivariate Gaussian graphical models, resolving a key question about the role of inverse covariance matrices in non-Gaussian distributions. The analysis integrates concepts from exponential family geometry, junction tree theory, and convex analysis. These population-level insights have implications for existing and new graph selection techniques, including an innovative approach for estimating structure with incomplete or corrupted data. We establish nonasymptotic performance bounds for these methods and validate their precision through simulation studies.

Pre-training plays a vital role in training deep neural networks effectively. Traditional pre-training techniques typically involve training basic models, such as restricted Boltzmann machines, and progressively stacking them to construct deeper architectures. While this layer-wise approach is well-supported both theoretically and empirically, it faces challenges when applied to models lacking a distinct hierarchical structure, such as recurrent neural networks (RNNs). This study introduces a novel pre-training strategy based on knowledge transfer learning. Unlike incremental layer-wise training, the proposed method optimizes the entire model simultaneously using a simplified objective function, leveraging soft targets generated by a pre-trained teacher model. This approach is model-agnostic, making it suitable for pre-training highly intricate architectures. Empirical validation on a speech recognition task confirmed that complex RNNs can be effectively trained using a less sophisticated deep neural network (DNN) model. Additionally, integrating this method with conventional layer-wise pre-training yields further performance improvements.

Chapter 2 Survey: This section aims to present an analysis of existing methodologies and highlight the core functionalities of the software under development.

The Model serves as the core component for managing data and business logic within the application. It handles data processing, user input management, and necessary computations, while avoiding direct interaction with the user interface. Instead, it communicates with the Controller to relay user inputs and update the View. The View, on the other hand, focuses on the application's presentation and user interface. It renders data received from the Model in a user-friendly format and facilitates user interaction. Unlike the Model, the View does not engage in data manipulation or business logic, as its sole purpose is to display information to the user.

Rubella là bệnh lây nhiễm qua đường hô hấp do virus rubella gây nên. Dù đa phần trường hợp bệnh nhẹ nhưng nếu phụ nữ mang thai mắc phải có thể dẫn đến dị tật nặng ở thai nhi, vì vậy việc phát hiện sớm nhiễm virus rubella là vô cùng quan trọng. Để đạt mục tiêu này, nhóm tác giả đã phát triển khay xét nghiệm nhanh kháng nguyên rubella dựa trên công nghệ sắc ký miễn dịch sử dụng hạt nano vàng. Nghiên cứu tập trung đánh giá các đặc tính của khay thử như ngưỡng phát hiện, khả năng phản ứng chéo với một số tác nhân gây bệnh, độ lặp lại, độ nhạy và độ đặc hiệu. Kết quả cho thấy khay thử có thể phát hiện mẫu chứa 10^5 PFU virus rubella, không phản ứng chéo với các tác nhân như Staphylococcus aureus, Streptococcus pyogenes, Candida albicans, virus sởi, virus cúm hay Adenovirus. Độ lặp lại đạt 100% với cả mẫu âm và dương tính, trong khi độ nhạy và độ đặc hiệu lần lượt đạt 98% và 99%.

Ví dụ, theo sơ đồ trên, biển cấm rẽ có tỷ lệ nhận diện chính xác là 0.56 (56%), nhưng tỷ lệ nhận diện nhầm với biển giới hạn tốc độ khá cao, đạt 30%. Offline Reinforcement Learning (RL) seeks to transform extensive datasets into effective decision-making systems without requiring real-time environment interactions. This potential has driven significant research aimed at mirroring RL’s achievements in simulated scenarios. From a practical perspective, this study evaluates these endeavors by first examining dataset characteristics that may determine the most effective offline approaches. These hypotheses are tested through experiments using custom datasets from environments with both discrete and continuous action spaces. The results confirm that data diversity and high-reward samples are essential for offline RL success, while behavioral cloning remains competitive with newer methods. This work serves as a guide to enhance understanding of current offline RL techniques and their practical applications.

Product embeddings have been extensively studied in recent years, forming the foundation for numerous machine learning applications in e-commerce. While these embeddings have demonstrated practical success, their underlying mechanisms remain poorly understood from a theoretical perspective. Existing insights from natural language processing (NLP) often depend on domain-specific characteristics that do not apply to e-commerce, and the target tasks typically emphasize different embedding aspects. This work adopts an e-commerce-centric approach to product embeddings, offering a comprehensive theoretical framework that integrates representation learning and learning theory. We demonstrate that embeddings generated by the widely-used skip-gram negative sampling algorithm and its variations achieve sufficient dimension reduction for a key product relatedness metric. The generalization capability in downstream machine learning tasks depends on how well the embeddings align with this product relatedness measure. Building on these theoretical findings, we perform exploratory experiments that validate our theoretical conclusions about product embeddings.

Semi-supervised learning refers to scenarios in which a substantial volume of data, denoted as X, is available, but only a subset of it is labeled. This category of problems lies between fully supervised and unsupervised learning. A typical example involves datasets where only a fraction of images or texts, such as photographs of people, animals, or scientific and political documents, are labeled, while the majority remain unlabeled.

UC Code UC15, titled "Creating Category," involves the Admin actor and allows the addition of new categories. The process is triggered by selecting the categories feature, with the precondition of logging in as an admin. The scenario includes: 1) selecting the categories feature, 2) displaying the creation interface, 3) entering the category name, 4) requesting creation, and 5) saving and displaying the successful creation. The result confirms the category is stored and displayed. Extensions and exceptions are not applicable. UC Code UC16, "Edit Category," permits the Admin to modify category names, triggered by selecting the edit feature, with the precondition that the category name exists. The steps involve: 1) choosing the edit feature, 2) displaying the current name, 3) entering a new name, 4) requesting an update, and 5) saving and displaying the updated name. The result confirms the update and storage of the new name, with no extensions or exceptions. UC Code UC17, "Delete Category," enables the Admin to remove a category, triggered by selecting the delete feature, with the precondition that the category exists. The scenario includes: 1) selecting the delete feature, 2) displaying a warning window, 3) confirming deletion, and 4) announcing successful deletion and removing associated product data. The result confirms the deletion, with an exception if the actor cancels the action. Input information specifies required conditions, such as the category name being mandatory. On June 1, Mr. Lê Văn Khoa, Vice Chairman of the Ho Chi Minh City People's Committee, announced plans to construct a new traffic interchange to alleviate congestion at the Cát Lái Port entrance, where traffic volumes have surged significantly (18,000–20,000 vehicles per day), causing persistent gridlock in the surrounding areas. The interchange will feature two lanes on Beltway 2 to reduce localized traffic jams, facilitating smoother vehicle movement between Phú Mỹ Bridge and Nguyễn Thị Định Road. A 17-meter-wide, 316-meter-long overpass with four lanes will be built along Beltway 2, connecting Phú Mỹ Bridge to Kỳ Hà 3 Bridge and vice versa. Additionally, an underpass will be constructed from Kỳ Hà 3 Bridge, allowing vehicles to turn onto Nguyễn Thị Định Road toward Cát Lái Port. Concurrently, the city will implement other traffic infrastructure projects to reduce vehicle flow at the Nguyễn Thị Định Road interchange, easing pressure on the area. On June 3, the Ho Chi Minh City People's Committee commenced construction of the Mỹ Thuỷ Overpass and Underpass Project in Cát Lái Ward, District 2. Mr. Khoa noted that the project will require the acquisition and clearance of over 5.76 hectares of land, affecting nearly 150 households in Cát Lái and Thạnh Mỹ Lợi Wards. The Mỹ Thuỷ Overpass Project is divided into two phases: Phase 1 and Phase 3 will involve constructing the overpass and underpass, forming a roundabout at the intersection with Nguyễn Thị Định Road and Kỳ Hà 3 Bridge. Four right-turn lanes will be built from Nguyễn Thị Định Road and Beltway 2, connecting Phú Mỹ Bridge to the high-tech zone and the Phú Hữu interchange leading to the Long Thành–Dầu Giây Expressway. The Mỹ Thuỷ Overpass is a key project aimed at reducing traffic congestion at the gateway to Cát Lái Port, improving connectivity between Phú Mỹ Bridge and Eastern Beltway (Beltway 2), and directing traffic toward the Long Thành–Dầu Giây Expressway. The underground tunnel at the interchange will form a roundabout as currently planned.

RCutMix outperforms the DACS approach, as shown in Table 4.1, delivering significant improvements for most classes, particularly sidewalk, rider, train, bicycle, and motorcycle. For instance, the train class achieves a 5.38 %IoU increase, while other methods often show no improvement. The motorcycle and bicycle classes also see substantial gains, rising from 14.42 %to 44.98 %IoU and 35.79 %to 57.63 %IoU, respectively, highlighting RCutMix's effectiveness for rare classes. However, performance declines for some rare classes like fence and terrain, likely due to RCutMix's limited impact on these categories. Unlike DACS, RCutMix emphasizes contextual relationships rather than merely transferring pixel groups based on inherent properties. This approach leverages shared semantic contexts between source and target domains, such as riders on bicycles or motorcycles and sidewalks adjacent to roads, enhancing performance for these classes. Conversely, classes like terrain and fence, which rely more on shape than surrounding context, show reduced performance with RCutMix. Figure 4.3 visualizes the feature space using UMAP before the classification layer on the GTA → Cityscapes benchmark. RClassMix compresses feature representations within classes more than RCutMix, focusing on inherent object properties, but exhibits significant overlap between motorcycle and bicycle representations. In contrast, RCutMix utilizes contextual information to better distinguish between frequently confused classes, such as motorcycle and bicycle, and separates the rider class from the person class due to its frequent association with motorcycles and bicycles. However, both methods struggle with the overlap between train and bus features, indicating persistent challenges in classifying the train class.

Có nhiều biện pháp để quản lý chi phí nói chung và chi phí vật liệu xây dựng nói riêng trong đầu tư xây dựng đường bộ cao tốc. Tuy nhiên, chi phí vật liệu xây dựng liên quan mật thiết đến yêu cầu chất lượng công trình và tiến độ thực hiện dự án. Vì vậy, việc chọn mô hình nghiên cứu và giả thuyết nghiên cứu nhằm phân tích mối quan hệ giữa thời gian - chi phí - chất lượng một cách khoa học sẽ giúp quy trình kiểm soát chi phí có cơ sở vững chắc. Mục đích của bài viết là tổng hợp các nghiên cứu trong nước và quốc tế về kiểm soát chi phí vật liệu xây dựng, lựa chọn mô hình và giả thuyết nghiên cứu, cũng như mối quan hệ giữa chất lượng, tiến độ và chi phí vật liệu trong mô hình chất lượng - tiến độ - chi phí khi kiểm soát giá vật liệu xây dựng đường cao tốc.

De Bruijn sequences have found unexpected applications in biology, particularly in genome assembly for DNA sequencing. For instance, Chaisson et al. introduced EULER-USR, a tool for assembling mate-paired short reads, and investigated the significance of read length. Compeau et al. proposed a genome assembly technique utilizing de Bruijn graphs. In 2001, Pevzner et al. replaced the traditional "overlap-layout-consensus" method with the Eulerian Superpath approach, effectively addressing the challenge of repeats in fragment assembly. Later, in 2003, Yu Zhang and Michael Waterman adapted Pevzner’s method for global multiple alignment of DNA sequences. Additionally, Han Mao et al. explored codes and their rates for DNA sequence profiles in DNA storage, leveraging the de Bruijn graph as a foundational framework.

Effectively tackling the issue of non-IID data in FL is a primary objective of the proposed novel algorithms, which must incorporate advanced strategies to mitigate its impact. Weighted aggregation emerges as a key approach, where the contributions of individual devices to the global model are adjusted based on criteria such as data quality or relevance. Another effective strategy is the application of data augmentation techniques, which artificially enhance the diversity of local datasets by introducing variations to existing data. This method enables the global model to better capture potential patterns and features, enhancing its adaptability and robustness. Furthermore, the integration of adaptive learning rates offers a practical solution by adjusting the speed of model updates according to the unique data distribution of each device. This adaptive approach ensures that the learning process is tailored to the specific complexities of non-IID scenarios, optimizing performance for each participating device. This thesis presents a novel algorithm aimed at improving the convergence rate of FL, particularly in addressing the challenges associated with non-IID data distributions.1.2 Background and Problems of Research Various algorithms have been proposed to aggregate local models into a unified global model, striving for optimal results. Among these, Federated Averaging (FedAvg) is one of the most widely recognized and employed.

Developing facial analysis systems capable of handling extreme variations in lighting and expressions remains a significant challenge, which synthetic data may help address. To this end, we introduce LEGAN, a novel synthesis framework that uses perceptual quality assessments to jointly modify lighting and expressions in face images without relying on paired training data. LEGAN separates lighting and expression features, applies transformations in the feature space, and then upscales to generate the output. A perceptual quality estimation model, trained on crowd-sourced naturalness ratings of images produced by various synthesis techniques, is incorporated as an auxiliary discriminator to enhance synthetic image realism. Evaluated using FID and LPIPS metrics, LEGAN outperforms models like StarGAN and StarGAN-v2 in generating high-quality facial images with varied lighting and expressions. A perceptual study confirms the alignment between our quality estimation and visual fidelity. Additionally, LEGAN proves effective as a data augmentation tool for improving expression recognition and face verification tasks.

Recent advancements in vision-related tasks have largely focused on enhancing deep learning models through techniques like architectural innovations (e.g., Residual Networks) and regularization methods such as Batch Normalization. These approaches primarily aim to improve model conditioning, enabling the training of increasingly deeper networks. This paper explores enhanced conditioning for Generative Adversarial Networks (GANs) in unsupervised learning by integrating the discriminative power of decision forests into the GAN discriminator. Our approach yields a more stable and well-conditioned model, with empirical results demonstrating substantial qualitative and quantitative improvements over existing GAN methods on the Oxford Flowers and Aligned Celebrity Faces datasets.

Nhân tố NF-κB có vai trò quan trọng trong hệ miễn dịch của nhiều loài sinh vật. Nghiên cứu này phân tích đặc điểm hóa lý và cấu trúc phân tử protein NFκBIα ở một số loài cá như cá bảy màu (Poecilia reticulata), cá rạn (Stegastes partitus), cá nheo Mỹ (Ictalurus punctatus), cá vây tay (Latimeria chalumnae), cá mập ma (Callorhinchus milii) bằng phương pháp in silico. Kết quả cho thấy các giá trị lý thuyết gồm điểm đẳng điện (pI: 4.37–5.09), hệ số tắt (EC: 17920–37650 / 17420–36900), chỉ số béo (AI: 85.88–98.83), chỉ số bất ổn định (II: 39.83–49.09), tổng điện tích âm (-R: 47–55) và dương (+R: 19–29), hệ số GRAVY (-0.611 đến -0.241) của protein NFκBIα ở cá. Trừ protein cá bảy màu, các protein còn lại đều dễ tan. Axit amin cysteine và liên kết cysteine xuất hiện trên tất cả chuỗi protein. Ở cấu trúc bậc hai, dạng xoắn (helices) và xoắn ngẫu nhiên (random coils) chiếm ưu thế với tỷ lệ tương đương, tiếp theo là dạng sợi (strands). Cấu trúc 3D của protein được xây dựng và đánh giá phù hợp cho NFκBIα thông qua kiểm định bằng các chương trình PROCHECK Ramachandran, ProQ và ProSA.

Bệnh sỏi đường mật là bệnh lý đã được ghi nhận từ lâu, có thể xuất hiện ở mọi lứa tuổi và tỷ lệ mắc tăng dần theo tuổi. Ở người già, bệnh thường nguy hiểm hơn do triệu chứng không rõ ràng, không điển hình, đặc biệt khi kèm theo các bệnh mạn tính. Nguy cơ biến chứng cao hơn do thể trạng yếu, sức đề kháng giảm. Mục tiêu nghiên cứu: 1. Khảo sát đặc điểm lâm sàng, cận lâm sàng và hình ảnh học ở bệnh nhân từ 60 tuổi trở lên điều trị sỏi đường mật tái phát. 2. Đánh giá kết quả điều trị sớm ở nhóm này. 3. So sánh hiệu quả điều trị giữa nhóm ≥60 tuổi và nhóm <60 tuổi. Phương pháp: Nghiên cứu hồi cứu, cắt ngang trên bệnh nhân điều trị sỏi đường mật tái phát tại Bệnh viện Bình Dân từ 01/2018 đến 06/2021. Mỗi nhóm (≥60 và <60 tuổi) gồm 90 bệnh nhân, chọn mẫu ngẫu nhiên. Kết quả: Nhóm ≥60 tuổi có tuổi trung bình 74,03 ± 9,43, tỷ lệ nữ/nam là 1,64. Bệnh mạn tính kèm theo nhiều hơn nhóm trẻ. Tam chứng Charcot chỉ gặp ở 22,8% cả hai nhóm. 92,8% phân loại ASA I-II, nhóm già chiếm tỷ lệ cao hơn. Hình ảnh học không khác biệt giữa hai nhóm. Tỷ lệ sạch sỏi nhóm ≥60 là 81,1%, nhóm <60 là 85,6%, chung là 83,2%. Không có khác biệt về kết quả điều trị. Biến chứng chảy máu trong mổ là phổ biến. Hiện nay, có rất nhiều ứng dụng chat phổ biến như Skype, Slack, hay sản phẩm trong nước như Zalo, nhưng các ứng dụng này thường hoạt động hiệu quả hơn dưới dạng app so với phiên bản web. Lý do chính là vì app chat mang lại trải nghiệm người dùng tốt hơn, cho phép gửi thông báo và tin nhắn ngay lập tức khi có kết nối internet mà không cần truy cập trang web. Tuy nhiên, web chat cũng có những ưu điểm riêng, chẳng hạn như khả năng tương thích đa nền tảng, dễ dàng cập nhật và bảo trì phiên bản. Để sử dụng ứng dụng web, người dùng chỉ cần mở trình duyệt và nhập URL hoặc tìm kiếm trang web, không cần tải và cài đặt từ cửa hàng ứng dụng, giúp tiết kiệm thời gian và không chiếm dung lượng bộ nhớ thiết bị. Nhờ đó, web chat trở nên dễ tiếp cận hơn đối với người dùng.

Authentication and authorization mechanisms utilize two distinct storage methods: local storage for access tokens and httpOnly cookies for refresh tokens, the latter offering enhanced security. This distinction ensures that executable JavaScript code within the UI application cannot access or modify the refresh token, which has a longer lifespan. While access tokens could also be stored in httpOnly cookies for increased confidentiality, they are stored in the client’s local storage to simplify the development process, enabling the local application to utilize tokens generated by the authentication service for a more production-like environment. Additionally, since access tokens have a relatively short lifespan (less than one hour), the risk associated with their loss is minimal compared to refresh tokens, which, if compromised, could allow attackers to perpetually impersonate a user and make unauthorized API calls.

Generative Adversarial Networks (GANs) have become increasingly prominent due to their capability to model image distributions. By learning to replicate the training data, they facilitate sampling from that domain and applying the acquired knowledge in practical scenarios. Various approaches have been introduced to improve GANs, such as incorporating feature matching into the loss regularization. Our goal is to extend GANs beyond the training data and investigate unexplored regions of the image manifold. We introduce a novel K-NN selective feature matching regularizer for GANs, termed K-GAN, which aligns high-level features with a target set Y during adversarial training on the base set X. We demonstrate that minimizing this additional term corresponds to reducing cross-entropy between the GAN’s distribution and set Y. Additionally, we propose a cascaded GAN framework, named Imaginative Adversarial Network (IAN), designed to synthesize a new distribution merging sets X and Y through sequential sampling and translation GANs. We evaluate various IAN configurations objectively and subjectively, highlighting applications such as manifold traversal and creative face generation for character design in films and video games.

It is demonstrated that the transition graph of \( S_n \) is Hamiltonian, and a Hamiltonian cycle within this graph corresponds to a U-cycle in \( S_n \). The central inquiry revolves around how to represent a U-cycle or Hamiltonian cycle, such as the sequence 1 4 5 2 4 3, which encodes the transitions 123→231→312→132→312→213→123. Even in \( S_3 \), it is shown that 5 is the minimal number of distinct symbols required for a U-cycle. More broadly, what is the least number of distinct symbols needed for a U-cycle in \( S_n \)? Interestingly, in \( S_3 \), it is possible to achieve this with only 4 symbols. For instance, the sequence 1 4 2 3 4 2 represents a Hamiltonian cycle.

Deep Learning (DL) is being applied to increasingly complex domains, offering transformative potential while introducing new concerns about its dependability in critical roles. This paper introduces a model-independent approach for evaluating the reliability of DL classifiers, combining robustness analysis with the operational profile (OP) of specific applications. The method involves dividing the input space into fine-grained segments and aggregating their robustness relative to ground truth, guided by the OP, with estimators provided for both robustness and operational profiles. This enables the calculation of misclassification probabilities (pmi) along with confidence intervals. A prototype tool is illustrated through simplified examples, while model assumptions and practical implementation challenges are examined. Although the approach highlights inherent obstacles in DL reliability assessment—such as limited ground truth data and scalability constraints—it proposes interim solutions to facilitate progress in this research area.

Đầu vào của mô hình là đặc trưng \( F_{b1} \in \mathbb{R}^{28 \times 28 \times 256} \) được trích xuất từ residual block đầu tiên của RNet. Sau khi qua các tầng tích chập và pooling, thu được \( F_{b1} \in \mathbb{R}^{256} \). Vector này được kết hợp với vector \( F_g \in \mathbb{R}^{2024} \) từ tầng pooling cuối cùng của RNet. Vector tổng hợp sau đó đi qua hai tầng đầy đủ với số nơ-ron lần lượt là 512 và 80, cuối cùng được đưa qua hàm sigmoid để thu về vector \( \mathbb{R}^{80} \) dương.

We introduce an automated variational inference technique designed for Bayesian structured prediction tasks that employ Gaussian process (GP) priors and linear-chain likelihoods. This method operates without requiring explicit knowledge of the structured likelihood model and efficiently handles large datasets. Additionally, we demonstrate that the expected likelihood term and its gradients in the variational objective (ELBO) can be approximated effectively using expectations derived from low-dimensional Gaussian distributions. The optimization of the ELBO is fully parallelizable across sequences and compatible with stochastic optimization, enhanced by control variates and advanced incremental optimization techniques for practical applicability. Experimental evaluations on natural language processing tasks reveal that our approach performs comparably to—and occasionally surpasses—specialized methods such as SVM-struct and CRFs, while addressing the scalability issues of prior sampling-based inference algorithms. This advancement represents a significant contribution toward automating inference in Bayesian structured prediction.

The significant interest in de Bruijn graphs, their sequences, and their generalizations stems from their wide-ranging and impactful applications. Shortly after the formal definition of these graphs was established, one of their earliest applications emerged in the development of shift-register sequences, particularly linear feedback shift registers. Over time, these sequences and graphs have been utilized in numerous diverse applications.

The growing effectiveness of single-agent reinforcement learning (RL) in IoT applications has spurred interest in multi-agent reinforcement learning (MARL), which, though more complex, offers greater potential for large-scale IoT deployments. This paper examines a voting-based MARL scenario where agents collaborate through voting to reach collective decisions, aiming to optimize global average returns. We model the MARL problem using a linear programming framework for policy optimization and introduce a distributed primal-dual method to derive the optimal solution. Additionally, we design a voting mechanism that ensures distributed learning maintains a sublinear convergence rate comparable to centralized approaches, meaning decentralized decision-making does not hinder the attainment of global optimality. Finally, we validate our algorithm’s convergence through numerical experiments and demonstrate its applicability in real-world multi-agent IoT systems.

Recent developments in integrating attention mechanisms into vision systems have prompted researchers to reevaluate the dominance of convolutional layers as the fundamental component. While attention aids CNNs in managing long-range dependencies, Ramachandran et al. (2019) demonstrated that attention can entirely supplant convolution while delivering top-tier results in vision tasks. This prompts the inquiry: do learned attention layers function akin to convolutional layers? Our findings indicate that attention layers are capable of executing convolution and frequently adopt this behavior in practice. We establish that a multi-head self-attention layer with an adequate number of heads is at least as expressive as any convolutional layer. Empirical results further reveal that self-attention layers focus on pixel-grid patterns in a manner comparable to CNN layers, supporting our theoretical conclusions. Our code is publicly available.

UC Code UC11, titled "Search Products," involves the participation of Admin, Staff, Lead, and Customer actors. This use case enables users to search for products based on specific properties or by entering a product name. The trigger event occurs when an actor selects search properties or inputs a product name into the search field. There are no preconditions required. The scenario unfolds as follows: first, the actor selects search properties, prompting the system to filter and retrieve relevant products. The system then displays the results based on the selected properties or category. Alternatively, if the actor enters a product name, the system filters and identifies products with names matching or resembling the input value.

Example 4.2 (Decomposition of 6-MdB sequence). As outlined in lemma 6, the 6-MdB sequence can be broken down into Lyndon words arranged in lexicographical order as follows: 000101, 001, 001101, 01, 011, 1. This thesis highlights that by appending a prefix to a suffix of a k-MdB sequence, a (k, s)-RdB sequence can be generated. Specifically, within the cycle representing the k-MdB sequence, arcs corresponding to (k, s)-RdB sequences are present. Figure 4.1 demonstrates this concept for k=6 and s=2, with the blue and red arcs denoting the prefix and suffix, respectively. Any substring formed by combining the prefix and suffix constitutes a (6,2)-RdB sequence.
J. Hoffman, E. Tzeng, T. Park, et al., “Cycada: Cycle-consistent adversarial domain adaptation,” in International conference on machine learning, Pmlr, 2018, pp. 1989–1998.

The outcomes of the Floyd-Warshall algorithm are saved for every floor within the building. Subsequently, the route and elevator details for each floor are computed. This data is essential for identifying the optimal path between floors, considering the elevators' availability and their positions. Finally, the code translates the index numbers of each floor's route into their corresponding coordinates. This conversion is required because the route information was initially stored as index numbers, which must now be mapped to actual floor coordinates. Additionally, the code determines the rotation for each floor's route, aiding in orienting individuals walking along the path in the correct direction.

Hệ thống được thiết kế bao gồm hai giao diện chính: giao diện dành cho ban quản trị và giao diện dành cho nhân viên. Giao diện ban quản trị cho phép thực hiện các thao tác như thêm, xóa tài khoản nhân viên, cũng như duyệt hoặc từ chối các đơn từ của nhân viên. Giao diện nhân viên tập trung vào việc quản lý thông tin cá nhân và thao tác với bảng chấm công của chính họ. Để đảm bảo tính chặt chẽ về nghiệp vụ, dễ dàng bảo trì, nâng cấp và hạn chế sai sót liên quan đến thông tin doanh nghiệp và tài chính nhân viên, hệ thống sẽ được phát triển dựa trên mô hình client-server, trong đó client là thiết bị người dùng và server là hệ thống tập trung. Server bao gồm các máy chủ được thiết kế cho các mục đích cụ thể, và client cùng các dịch vụ giao tiếp với nhau thông qua các API.1.4 Bố cục đồ án Các chương tiếp theo của báo cáo đồ án tốt nghiệp sẽ trình bày chi tiết các nội dung liên quan.

An activation function is a mathematical operation employed in neural networks to determine the output of individual neurons. It is typically applied after computing the weighted sum of inputs from neurons in the preceding layer. By producing non-linear outputs, the activation function enables the network to learn and model intricate patterns within the data. In the absence of an activation function, the neural network would be limited to performing linear transformations, rendering it incapable of capturing complex data features.

One of the primary objectives in developing the multiplayer feature for Funny Zoo was to ensure stable and seamless gameplay. Unlike single-player games, multiplayer games operating over the internet must address several challenges, with latency being a significant factor. Latency, defined as the delay between an action and its visible effect in games, often manifests as a critical issue. For instance, pressing a joystick button and observing the corresponding movement of a character exemplifies latency. In real-time game genres, minimizing round-trip delays is crucial due to the importance of response times. However, in Funny Zoo, round-trip time (RTT) is less of a concern since the game is primarily played over a LAN setup. Nonetheless, factors such as jitter (the variation in ping over time) and packet loss must still be carefully considered.

Content-based video retrieval focuses on identifying videos within a large database that closely resemble or are near-duplicates of a query video. The performance of such systems heavily relies on video representation techniques and similarity search methods. Traditional approaches often depend on extensive manually labeled training data, which is both resource-intensive and inefficient. Furthermore, many existing systems use frame-level features for similarity comparisons, leading to high storage and computational costs. To overcome these limitations, we introduce SVRTN, a novel retrieval system that leverages self-supervised learning to derive video representations from unannotated data, eliminating the need for costly manual labeling. Additionally, SVRTN employs a transformer architecture to consolidate frame-level features into clip-level representations, minimizing storage requirements and search complexity. This approach captures complementary and discriminative information through frame interactions while maintaining robustness to frame order variations and missing data, enabling more flexible retrieval. Extensive evaluations on the FIVR-200K and SVD datasets demonstrate SVRTN's superior accuracy and efficiency in video retrieval tasks.

A REST API, or RESTful API, refers to an application programming interface (a collection of definitions and protocols for building and integrating software) that adheres to the principles of the REST architectural style, enabling interaction with RESTful web services. When a client makes a request for a resource using a RESTful API, the resource's representation is delivered to the requester or endpoint. This representation is transmitted over HTTP in various formats, such as JSON (JavaScript Object Notation), HTML, XML, Python, PHP, or plain text. This method of communication is widely recognized and utilized in web application development.

Machine learning algorithms rely on structured, labeled data for predictions, requiring human experts to define and organize specific features from input data into tables. In contrast, deep learning reduces the need for extensive data preprocessing by enabling the processing of unstructured data, such as text and images, and automating feature extraction. This minimizes the reliance on human intervention, as deep learning algorithms independently establish the hierarchy of features, unlike machine learning, where this process is manually performed by experts.

When considering opportunity cost, microservices present a more advantageous approach compared to monoliths. While monolithic applications are simpler to deploy, their frequent redeployment is hindered by lengthy testing processes. In contrast, microservices enable faster updates, facilitating the release of new features and quicker bug fixes. Monoliths rely on a single codebase and scale by replicating the entire application, whereas microservices consist of multiple services with independent scaling capabilities. Although monoliths are easier for new team members to understand, microservices allow newcomers to focus on smaller, more manageable services. Microservices also support the adoption of newer technologies and offer flexibility in programming languages, whereas monoliths are typically limited to a single language. Testing in microservices can be challenging due to the need for mock services, but error tracing is more straightforward in monoliths. Deployment is simpler for monoliths as they involve a single packaged application, while microservices require all services to be operational for the system to function. Updating a monolith necessitates redeploying the entire application, whereas microservices only require redeploying the updated service. Although monoliths have lower initial costs, microservices offer long-term benefits despite higher upfront expenses. Nghiên cứu này phân tích ảnh hưởng của tín dụng thương mại (TDTM) lên tốc độ điều chỉnh (SOA) cấu trúc vốn (CTV) hướng tới đòn bẩy mục tiêu ở các doanh nghiệp Việt Nam. TDTM được đo lường bằng tỷ lệ khoản phải trả trên tổng tài sản. Dựa trên dữ liệu từ các công ty phi tài chính niêm yết giai đoạn 2010–2021 và áp dụng mô hình hồi quy Bayes, kết quả chỉ ra rằng TDTM giúp đẩy nhanh quá trình điều chỉnh CTV. Nghiên cứu cũng phát hiện tác động khác biệt của TDTM lên SOA CTV giữa các công ty có đòn bẩy cao hơn hoặc thấp hơn mục tiêu, trong đó TDTM thúc đẩy SOA CTV mạnh hơn ở nhóm doanh nghiệp có đòn bẩy vượt mục tiêu. Đồng thời, kết quả cũng cho thấy các công ty tại Việt Nam sử dụng TDTM nhằm tiết kiệm dòng tiền và điều chỉnh tỷ lệ nợ về mức mong muốn.

Logistic Regression is a statistical learning method employed for binary classification tasks. It estimates the probabilities of a binary target variable belonging to each class by modeling the relationship between input features and the target. The algorithm utilizes the logistic (sigmoid) function to convert a ar combination of input features into a probability value ranging from 0 to 1. During training, model parameters are optimized using maximum likelihood estimation or gradient-based methods. Predictions are made by applying a threshold to the computed probabilities. Logistic Regression is favored for its interpretability, simplicity, and computational efficiency. However, its assumption of a ar relationship between features and the log odds of the target variable can restrict its effectiveness when dealing with complex nonar relationships.

Mỗi công việc hoặc giai đoạn được thể hiện bằng hai thanh ngang. Thanh trên biểu thị tiến độ thực tế, trong khi thanh dưới thể hiện tiến độ dự kiến. Phương pháp hiển thị này dựa trên đường cơ sở (baseline), giúp trực quan hóa rõ ràng tiến độ dự án. Thanh tiến độ thực tế của giai đoạn được đánh dấu bằng hai đoạn thẳng màu đen ở hai đầu để phân biệt với thanh tiến độ của công việc. Các cột mốc được biểu diễn bằng hình thoi. Màu sắc của mỗi công việc, giai đoạn hoặc cột mốc phản ánh đánh giá tiến độ tương ứng: màu đỏ chỉ trạng thái quá hạn, màu xanh thể hiện công việc chưa đến thời điểm thực hiện hoặc tiến độ nhanh hơn dự kiến, và màu vàng biểu thị sự chậm trễ tiến độ.

Recent advancements in neural network compression techniques, particularly channel pruning, have gained prominence for reducing the size and computational demands of deep neural networks (DNNs), making them suitable for resource-limited environments like embedded systems. To streamline the pruning process and eliminate manual effort, reinforcement learning (RL)-based auto-pruning methods have been introduced. However, these approaches suffer from prolonged training durations and high sampling costs, hindering their practical deployment. To address these challenges, this paper presents an efficient auto-pruning framework that leverages historical pruning data to enhance performance. The framework accelerates RL-pruner convergence through transfer learning, employs an augmented transfer learning strategy to further optimize training speed, and incorporates an assistant learning mechanism to improve sample efficiency. Experimental results demonstrate that the proposed framework achieves a 1.5-2.5x speedup for ResNet20 and 1.81-2.375x for other architectures, including ResNet56, ResNet18, and MobileNet v1.

Ví dụ, trong một ứng dụng giỏ hàng, khi người dùng đã chọn các sản phẩm muốn mua và quyết định thanh toán trên trang web, họ sẽ nhấn nút gửi. Ứng dụng cần lưu lại các mục mà người dùng đã chọn. Tuy nhiên, ASP.Net có thể quản lý trạng thái thay cho bạn thông qua tính năng lưu giữ giỏ hàng và chuyển các mục đã chọn qua trang thanh toán.

Implementing lerp in this configuration partially addresses the choppiness issue, though it remains ineffective in mitigating jittering. Additionally, this approach introduces a drawback: if an object teleports to a new position, the player perceives a rapid movement instead of an instantaneous jump. While this could be resolved by including a "reset" flag in the state packet, a more effective synchronization method exists. Rather than solely storing the latest state, all incoming server updates are buffered, enabling the client to utilize more data for smoother gameplay, albeit at the expense of increased processing. Each state update packet now contains a timestamp indicating when the state was snapshotted (see Figure 5.2). During each client game loop, the buffer is read to select the most recent snapshot due for processing (i.e., its sent time precedes the reference time) as the interpolation target. This process may consume multiple snapshots from the buffer. Subsequently, lerp is applied between the previous interpolation target and the newly selected one.

Nghiên cứu này tập trung đánh giá một số đặc tính của xanthan sau chiếu xạ nhằm ứng dụng trong sản xuất phân bón lá. Dung dịch xanthan 2% được xử lý bằng chùm điện tử (EB) với liều lượng 10, 20, 30 và 50 kGy, cùng suất liều 1,5; 3,5 và 7,5 kGy/s. Các yếu tố được khảo sát gồm ảnh hưởng của liều chiếu và suất liều đến tính chất của xanthan trong dung dịch. Kết quả cho thấy độ nhớt và khối lượng phân tử của xanthan giảm khi tăng liều xạ và suất liều. Quá trình chiếu xạ EB không thay đổi cấu trúc xanthan, dù phổ UV-Vis và FT-IR đều ghi nhận sự gia tăng đỉnh hấp thụ nhóm carbonyl do hình thành liên kết đôi C=O từ quá trình cắt mạch. Các phân đoạn xanthan sau chiếu xạ có độ linh động cao hơn, dẫn đến độ kết tinh và nhiệt độ nóng chảy cũng tăng theo.

This research addresses the challenge of robust zero-shot planning in dynamic stochastic environments. We examine time-varying Markov Decision Processes (MDPs) and analyze Model-Based Reinforcement Learning approaches under these conditions. Our framework rests on two key assumptions: 1) the environment changes continuously with a limited rate of variation; 2) the current model is available at each decision point, though its future progression remains unknown. Our contributions are fourfold: 1) we formalize a specialized category of MDPs termed Non-Stationary MDPs (NSMDPs), introducing the concept of regular evolution through Lipschitz-Continuity assumptions for transition and reward functions over time; 2) we investigate a planning agent that utilizes the current environmental model without knowledge of its future changes, prompting a worst-case analysis where the environment acts adversarially; 3) building on this perspective, we develop the Risk-Averse Tree-Search (RATS) algorithm, a zero-shot Model-Based technique analogous to Minimax search; 4) we empirically demonstrate RATS' advantages and benchmark its performance against established Model-Based algorithms.

A multilayer perceptron (MLP) is a form of Artificial Neural Network (ANN) comprising multiple hidden layers of perceptrons. In contrast to single-layer perceptrons, MLPs can model more intricate functions due to their ability to create unlimited decision boundaries. This connection between perceptrons and MLPs parallels the relationship between support vector machines (SVMs) and SVMs employing nonlinear kernel functions.

Nhờ cơ chế xử lý sự kiện, máy chủ có thể phản hồi theo cách non-blocking, đồng thời hỗ trợ mở rộng tốt hơn so với các máy chủ truyền thống, vốn bị giới hạn bởi số lượng luồng (thread) để xử lý yêu cầu. Ngoài ra, các ứng dụng NodeJS không sử dụng bộ đệm (buffer) để lưu trữ dữ liệu tạm thời mà thay vào đó, dữ liệu được xuất ra theo từng khối.
